TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstanceCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: The AdamInstanceCollection class is a read-only collection that contains objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The AdamInstanceCollection class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance adamInstance) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to search for in this collection.
Docs.summary: Determines if the specified object is in this collection.
Docs.returns: if the object is in this collection; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance[] adamInstances, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance[] adamInstances, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of objects that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in `adamInstances` where this method starts copying this collection.
Docs.summary: Copies all objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The destination array is not large enough to hold the required number of elements.
The specified is out of range of the destination array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance adamInstance) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to search for in this collection.
Docs.summary: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified object in this collection.
Docs.returns: The zero-based index of the first matching object. Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the object.
Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the object to get.
Docs.summary: Gets an object in this collection.
Docs.value: The object that exists at the specified index.
Docs.exception: The specified is out of range of the collection.
